synopsis.text: Evol ving in her late father's footsteps, a young woman becomes the president and producer of a small video production company, Miracle Entertainment, teetering on the brink of bankruptcy. Desperate to revive her father's once-popular TV program and salvage the company, she encounters four enigmatic men, each possessing a unique background and personality. Among them are a brilliant scientist, a charismatic idol, a police officer specializing in Evolver-related crimes, and the CEO of the financial group backing her company. As she becomes entangled with these Evolvers, she unwittingly uncovers a colossal conspiracy shrouding her father's death and her own lost memories. With the truth lurking in the shadows, she must navigate the complex web of secrets surrounding the special powers known as 'Evol.'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
